resources.string: Here we will show the type
Here we will show the players
Welcome to the game! \nHere we will show the card content
You cannot have ALL cards disabled you silly :)
RECOMMENDED MODE: Create your players and enjoy all the cards in the game with specific challenges for each one of you
Fast Mode where all cards refer to all players and there are not specific challenges
You cannot add more than %d players
You need to create at least one player
Caution: Drink with responsibility. I am an app I cannot take you back home or help you with your actions.
You can unlock more cards for FREE! Just press the UNLOCK button on each pack you want and watch the video. Once you unlock a pack, is yours for ever.
PACK 1: Unlock 50 more Cards of all types to increase the fun!
PACK 2: Unlock 30 more Cards of all types to increase the fun!

For playing Party Cards you will need:

- A soft drink like Beer or Wine or some strong alcohol like Vodka, Rum, Gin mixed with soda or juice. 

- Shot glasses and some strong alcohol to fill it.

 - Friends (optional depending on the power of your imagination)

When Party Cards tells you to drink a sip drink from your soft drink glass. When it tells you to drink a shot fill the shot glass with strong alcohol and drink it.

The game consist in drawing cards using the next card button. There are four types of cards: Common, Rare, Epic and Legendary. The challenges that will appear in the cards will be more difficult based on their rarity. Have fun seeing your friends get Legendary challenges or cry if you are the lucky one. Remember you can turn off some types of cards in the options menu and you can unlock more cards for free clicking the MORE CARDS button in the start menu. Drink with responsibility because we will not be responsible for any consequences that could happen. THANK YOU for downloading our app. YOU ARE A BEAUTIFUL PERSON!
